description.zh-cn: 英国保守党政治人物，1937年5月至1940年5月担任英国首相，以其绥靖主义外交政策闻名。
description.en: British Conservative politician who served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from May 1937 to May 1940, known for his foreign policy of appeasement.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治家，曾担任伯明翰市市长和内阁殖民地大臣，是内维尔·张伯伦和奥斯汀·张伯伦的父亲。
description.en: British politician who served as Mayor of Birmingham and Colonial Secretary, and was the father of Neville Chamberlain and Austen Chamberlain.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治家，曾担任财政大臣、外交大臣等职，是内维尔·张伯伦的异母长兄。
description.en: British politician who served as Chancellor of the Exchequer and Foreign Secretary, and was the half-brother of Neville Chamberlain.

description.zh-cn: 内维尔·张伯伦的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Neville Chamberlain.

description.zh-cn: 位于伯明翰的一所大学学院，是伯明翰大学的前身。
description.en: A university college in Birmingham, which was the predecessor institution of the University of Birmingham.

description.zh-cn: 英国自由党政治家，于1916年至1922年担任英国首相。
description.en: A British Liberal politician who served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 1916 to 1922.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治家，1940年至1945年及1951年至1955年两度担任英国首相，被认为是20世纪最重要的政治领袖之一。
description.en: A British statesman who served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 1940 to 1945 and again from 1951 to 1955, and is regarded as one of the most significant political leaders of the 20th century.

description.zh-cn: 一种外交政策，指为了避免战争而向侵略性强权作出政治、物质或领土上的让步。
description.en: A diplomatic policy of making political, material, or territorial concessions to an aggressive power in order to avoid conflict.

description.zh-cn: 奥地利裔德国政治人物，纳粹党党魁，自1933年至1945年担任德国独裁者。
description.en: An Austrian-born German politician who was the dictator of Germany from 1933 to 1945. He rose to power as the leader of the Nazi Party.

description.zh-cn: 允许纳粹德国吞并捷克斯洛伐克苏台德地区的协定。
description.en: An agreement permitting Nazi Germany's annexation of the Sudetenland in Czechoslovakia.

description.zh-cn: 指阿道夫·希特勒和纳粹党统治下的德国（1933-1945）。
description.en: Refers to Germany under the rule of Adolf Hitler and the Nazi Party (1933–1945).

description.zh-cn: 1918年至1992年存在的中欧国家。
description.en: A country in Central Europe that existed from 1918 to 1992.

description.zh-cn: 德国、斯洛伐克及苏联对波兰的入侵，标志着第二次世界大战在欧洲的爆发。
description.en: The invasion of Poland by Germany, Slovakia, and the Soviet Union, which marked the beginning of World War II in Europe.

description.zh-cn: 位于欧洲大陆西北面的主权国家。
description.en: A sovereign country located off the north-western coast of the European mainland.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，盟军与德国在德国入侵挪威后进行的战役。
description.en: A campaign fought in Norway between the Allies and Germany during the Second World War, following the German invasion of the country.

nodes.id: 利奥波德·斯登尼·艾默里

zh-cn: 利奥波德·斯登尼·艾默里

description.zh-cn: 英国保守党政治家，以其对军事准备的兴趣、对大英帝国的支持以及对绥靖政策的反对而闻名。
description.en: A British Conservative politician, noted for his interest in military preparedness, the British Empire and his opposition to appeasement.

description.zh-cn: 英国的一个中左翼政党。
description.en: A centre-left political party in the United Kingdom.

en: Prime Minister of the United Kingdom

description.zh-cn: 英国的政府首脑。
description.en: The head of government of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 英国保守党政治家，曾在两次世界大战之间三度出任首相。
description.en: A British Conservative politician who served as Prime Minister on three occasions between the world wars.

description.zh-cn: 英国伯明翰的一个富裕郊区。
description.en: An affluent suburban area of Birmingham, England.

description.zh-cn: 约瑟夫·张伯伦是内维尔·张伯伦的父亲。
description.en: Joseph Chamberlain was Neville Chamberlain's father.

description.zh-cn: 奥斯汀·张伯伦是内维尔·张伯伦的异母长兄。
description.en: Austen Chamberlain was Neville Chamberlain's elder half-brother.

description.zh-cn: 内维尔·张伯伦于1911年与安妮·维尔·柯尔结婚。
description.en: Neville Chamberlain married Anne de Vere Cole in 1911.

description.zh-cn: 内维尔·张伯伦出生于伯明翰的埃奇巴斯顿。
description.en: Neville Chamberlain was born in Edgbaston, Birmingham.

description.zh-cn: 内维尔·张伯伦曾就读于梅森理学院，学习冶金学。
description.en: Neville Chamberlain studied metallurgy at Mason Science College.

description.zh-cn: 在担任国家服务总监期间与首相劳合·乔治关系不佳并辞职，两人在政治生涯中始终互相排斥。
description.en: Had a poor relationship with Prime Minister Lloyd George while serving as Director of National Service and resigned; the two remained mutually antagonistic throughout their careers.

position.en: Prime Minister of the United Kingdom

description.zh-cn: 内维尔·张伯伦接替斯坦利·鲍德温成为英国首相。
description.en: Neville Chamberlain succeeded Stanley Baldwin as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 温斯顿·丘吉尔接替内维尔·张伯伦出任英国首相。
description.en: Winston Churchill succeeded Neville Chamberlain as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 内维尔·张伯伦接替斯坦利·鲍德温出任英国首相。
description.en: Neville Chamberlain succeeded Stanley Baldwin as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 内维尔·张伯伦以其对纳粹德国的绥靖外交政策而闻名。
description.en: Neville Chamberlain was known for his foreign policy of appeasement towards Nazi Germany.

description.zh-cn: 温斯顿·丘吉尔是绥靖政策的坚定反对者。
description.en: Winston Churchill was a staunch opponent of the policy of appeasement.

description.zh-cn: 内维尔·张伯伦是《慕尼黑协定》的签署者之一，该协定允许德国吞并捷克斯洛伐克的苏台德地区。
description.en: Neville Chamberlain was one of the signatories of the Munich Agreement, which allowed Germany to annex the Sudetenland from Czechoslovakia.

description.zh-cn: 《慕尼黑协定》允许纳粹德国吞并捷克斯洛伐克的苏台德地区。
description.en: The Munich Agreement permitted Nazi Germany to annex the Sudetenland from Czechoslovakia.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国于1939年9月1日入侵波兰，发动了波兰战役。
description.en: Nazi Germany launched the Invasion of Poland on September 1, 1939.

description.zh-cn: 德国入侵波兰后，英国于1939年9月3日对德宣战。
description.en: Following the German invasion of Poland, the United Kingdom declared war on Germany on September 3, 1939.

description.zh-cn: 盟军在挪威战役中的失败导致了议会对张伯伦政府的信任危机，并最终使其辞职。
description.en: The failure of the Allied forces in the Norwegian campaign led to a crisis of confidence in Chamberlain's government, ultimately causing his resignation.

relationships.source: 利奥波德·斯登尼·艾默里

description.zh-cn: 利奥波德·斯登尼·艾默里在议会发表了严厉批评张伯伦的演讲，对其政治声望造成了巨大打击。
description.en: Leopold Stennett Amery delivered a scathing speech in Parliament criticizing Chamberlain, which was a significant blow to his political standing.

description.zh-cn: 工党拒绝加入由内维尔·张伯伦领导的联合政府，这是导致他辞职的直接原因之一。
description.en: The Labour Party refused to join a national government led by Neville Chamberlain, which was one of the direct causes of his resignation.

description.zh-cn: 辞去首相后，内维尔·张伯伦在丘吉尔的战时内阁中担任枢密院议长。
description.en: After resigning as Prime Minister, Neville Chamberlain served as Lord President of the Council in Churchill's war cabinet.
